> I guess it might be related to this:
> 
> >I got this only once and it looked like the scriptlet was not executed at the right time
> 
> 
>

I believe I tracked it down: it's one of the computerbase scriptlets in the **AdGuard German Filter** that causes the breakage. Likely this one:

`coputerbase.de#%#//scriptlet('prevent-element-src-loading', 'img', 'pagead2.googlesyndication.com')`
